metadata.title: CVE-2020-7064 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In PHP versions 7.2.x below 7.2.9, 7.3.x below 7.3.16 and 7.4.x below7.4.4, while parsing EXIF data with exif_read_data() function, it ispossible for malicious data to cause PHP to read one byte of uninitializedmemory. This could potentially lead to information disclosure or crash.

criterions.comment: php5: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
